title: PakNAcc
text: Provides comprehensive suite tools analyzing Pakistan’s Quarterly National Accounts data. Users can gain detailed insights Pakistan’s economic performance, visualize quarterly trends, detect patterns anomalies key economic indicators. Compare sector contributions—including agriculture, industry, services—understand influence economic growth decline. Customize analyses filtering manipulating data focus specific areas interest. Ideal policymakers, researchers, analysts aiming make informed, data-driven decisions based timely detailed economic insights.
